name: Pango
overview: This all-Italian title, developed by the Genialogic Team , is a bizarre and original mix between Lemmings and Tetris. In the game we will take on the role of Pango, a nice Pangolino passionate about videogames that in the initial sequence of the game sees his girlfriend being kidnapped by " Massacrator VII ", his favorite coin-op. Pango will then throw himself into the coin-op screen, following Massacrator, to recover his beloved. The gameplay involves using the typical Tetris blocks to build a path that allows Pango to reach the exit of each level. There are 42 in total to deal with before bringing the "beautiful" PangoLinda to safety . The game was released in 1992 for Commodore Amiga by Proxxima Entertainment and the Italian distribution was curated by Softel of Rome.
